name: One Night with Spong 3: Feathered Frenzy
name_original: One Night with Spong 3: Feathered Frenzy
description:
THIS IS A JOKE GAME

You escaped Spong and had Christmas joy! But he wasn't happy with the outcome...

You are babysitting Jotbell's (support him!) birds. Everything is going fine until the dastardly Spong appears and mind controls them to kill you! You must survive, or you will die!!

PLAY THE PREQUEL: https://shoodigity.itch.io/spong-2

PLAY THE ORIGINAL: https://shoodigity.itch.io/spong

JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/7nJd2vrbyy

HOW TO PLAY!
  • When you hear Spong (knocking), press up arrow and wait
  • When Ari (Green Cheeked Conure) appears, click on her
  • When Perry (African Grey Parrot) appears, click on him 3 times
  • When you hear Faith (Cockatoo), press E
CREDITS:

Shoodigity (Me): Programmer, Creator of ONwS.

Jotbell: Owner of Ari, Perry, and Faith, (They're real birds!) Ideas, Support

Vortex_ware: Porting the games to Gamejolt since my account got banned.

And to YOU for playing!
